Reviews.Title: “A great hotel in a great location in a great city.”
Reviews.Author: Travelibrarian
Reviews.Content: love hotel stayed twice 5 staff charming breakfast location perfect 197 bus schiphol airport drop 4 blocks hotel set 4 euro 35 taxi trams town walk visit trip stayed doubles roomy stay singles fairly laid push bag desk arent tripping fine person clean lots hot water reasonable price lovely yard breakfast watch parrots native amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Great Value for a 4 Person Room”
Reviews.Author: Kevin T
Reviews.Content: trip amsterdam 4 person 4 single beds nice nice little sitting isnt exactly posh value 230 usd night stayed location easy decent map

Reviews.Title: “A Great City Pad”
Reviews.Author: Turmstrasse
Reviews.Content: hotel situated quiet residential street 10 minute walk leidseplein shops restaurants ensuite clean comfortable pillows ensured nights sleep breakfast buffet ample choice quality staff lovely smiling extremely friendly special mention cat lives definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “quiet area, next to fondel park”
Reviews.Author: kazy2
Reviews.Content: friend staied hotel couple nights garden relaxing breakfast clean friendly staff forgot thisi expencive save stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, great location.”
Reviews.Author: luckygirlkris
Reviews.Content: hotel located quiet street five minute walk leidseplein happening nightlife abundant restaurants ten minute walk museums rijksmuseum van gogh museum five minute walk bus takes fromto schipol airport museum tram stop nearby comparable european boutique hotels wifi charge 12 euro 5 hours continental breakfast cold cuts hard boiled eggs toast cereal juice coffee included nice overlooking patio garden resident cat lounging sofa window nice breakfast goes 1030 am staff husband friendly entertaining times sometimes memorable touch makes breaks hotel

Reviews.Title: “LOCATION ! LOCATION ! LOCATION !”
Reviews.Author: Solo54
Reviews.Content: hotel night amsterdam didnt realize queens day weekend hotels including booked graciously allowed stay night location convenient able id planned day night pleasant clean comfortable balcony 1 enjoyed gregory house cat greeted sat main patio

Reviews.Title: “Quiet. Clean. Friendly. Not luxury, but perfect for us.”
Reviews.Author: cksiam
Reviews.Content: wife stayed evening based tripadvisor reviews booked emailing reservations quick responsive medium twin american standards cramped wife perfectly comfortable top floor hotel quiet breakfast decent price staff wonderful location quiet amsterdam easy amsterdam stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel in a great location.”
Reviews.Author: rsg1952
Reviews.Content: wife son stayed nights july 2010 nice size bathroom terrace overlooking garden hotel five minute walk museums square restaurants cafes bars staff friendly helpful free breakfast stay

Reviews.Title: “Great deal with the best location in Amsterdam !”
Reviews.Author: Shane1977
Reviews.Content: hotel clean feels homely staff help hotels strongest location mins walk lively leidseplein disturbed crowds noise hotel leads vondelpark stroll staff extremely warm stay comfortable willing chat basic clean ours spacious triple breakfast special cares theres tons stuff snack amsterdam definitely stay returned

Reviews.Title: “Great value friendly family hotel”
Reviews.Author: phy9pas
Reviews.Content: stayed cycling trip amsterdam hotel couldnt helpful leave bikes garden friendly stayed bed top floor spacious ceilings decoration traditional clean maintained stairs narrow steep struggle youre frail breakfast expect dutch hotel cereal breads cheeses fruit etc quality food sets nicely day dining looks onto garden pleasant cant recommend highly value standards budget hotel

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Hestia
HotelInfo.Address: Roemer Visscherstraat 7, Amsterdam 1054 EV, The Netherlands
